name: Dream Song ~ PC & Mac game. A quest for real treasure
blurb: Story based puzzle solving adventure. Gameplay rewards are not just virtual prizes or level ups - they are real!

rewards.reward: No Reward
Pledge $1 approx / \u20ac1 approx\r\n===========================1. SILENT WATCHER ~ Our sincere thanks and a digital Dream Song Backers Badge for this support tier.

Pledge $11 approx / \u20ac8 approx\r\n===========================\r\n2. ENTER THE DREAM ~ A digital copy of Dream Song Part 1 for your preferred platform (PC or Mac) as soon as it is released and a digital Dream Song Backers Badge for this support tier.

Pledge $23 approx / \u20ac17 approx\r\n===========================\r\n3. DREAM CRYSTAL ~ the full game with all it has to offer. A digital copy of Dream Song Parts 1 & 2 for your preferred platform (PC or Mac) as soon as each part is released. Your name in the credits and a digital Dream Song Backers Badge for this support tier.

Pledge $33 approx / \u20ac24 approx\r\n===========================\r\n4. SONGBOOK ~ Especially for the budding songwriter. All previous rewards, plus artists\u2019 name and title of self-penned song listed in \u2018The Book of Songs\u2019 (also listed on our website under Radio & Songbook Music Credits - add \u00a35 to include a link to your website or social media page. In other currency add $00 / \u20ac00). There for all to see. Just find Grandpa\u2019s room in the game and take it down from the shelf to read, plus a digital Dream Song Backers Badge for this support tier.

Pledge $42 approx / \u20ac30 approx \r\n===========================\r\n5. DREAM SONG PLUS ~ A digital copy of Dream Song Parts 1 & 2 for your preferred platform (PC or Mac) as soon as each part is released. Your name in the credits, a PDF Booklet of concept art, a mp3 of original \u2018Dream Song\u2019 recording with copy of lyrics, plus an exclusively recorded mp3 sound track \u2018The Flight of the Song Thrush\u2019 (this sound track will only be available to KS Backers), including a specially designed Song Thrush Wallpaper to adorn your desktop, plus a digital Dream Song Backers Badge for this support tier. The SONGBOOK tier and its rewards are not included with this pledge.

Pledge $58 approx / \u20ac42 approx \r\n===========================\r\n6. LIMITED EDITION POSTCARD ~ A unique set of 12 postcards (as used in game) based on Clara E Atwood\u2019s Book of Nursery Rhyme illustrations of 1901. Please note that delivery of postcards will be October 2014. OTHER PREVIOUS REWARDS INCLUDED ARE: DREAM SONG PLUS. Not forgetting a digital Dream Song Backers Badge for this support tier.

Pledge $67 approx / \u20ac48 approx\r\n===========================\r\n7. YOUR SONG ON THE RADIO (SAMPLE) ~ A 30 second sample of your self-penned song (mp3 recording) featured on the Walt Wowser Show on \u2018Grandpa\u2019s Radio\u2019 \u2013 to hear just enter the Library in the game, tune in the radio and enjoy the show. The artists\u2019 name and title of song will be mentioned on Walt\u2019s show as well as being listed in \u2018The Book of Songs\u2019 (Will also be listed on our website under Radio & Songbook Music Credits and will include a link to your website or social media page). OTHER PREVIOUS REWARDS INCLUDED ARE: DREAM CRYSTAL (the full game). Also a digital Dream Song Backers Badge for this support tier.

Pledge $84 approx / \u20ac60 approx\r\n===========================\r\n8. BOOK OF DREAMERS ~  Your name listed in the legendary \u2018Book of Dreamers\u2019. Just find Grandpa\u2019s Study in the game and take it down from the shelf to read. OTHER PREVIOUS REWARDS INCLUDED ARE: DREAM SONG PLUS, and LIMITED EDITION POSTCARD. Also a digital Dream Song Backers Badge for this support tier.

Pledge $134 approx / \u20ac97 approx\r\n===========================\r\n9. NAME ON THE STONE ~ Your Name engraved along with the other \u2018Battle Lords\u2019 on the memorial stone in the dark realm of the Wizard-King Azmad. Also lists your name and deeds in \u2018The Tale of the Glorious Fifty\u2019 (a PDF Chronicle plus a digital image of the memorial stone featuring your name), plus unique 'Rune styled 8 gig USB Memory Pen' (see illustration). OTHER PREVIOUS REWARDS INCLUDED ARE: DREAM SONG PLUS, and LIMITED EDITION POSTCARD. Also a digital Dream Song Backers Badge for this support tier.

Pledge $167 approx / \u20ac120 approx\r\n===========================\r\n10. NAME ON THE SPINE ~ Wow! Like a famous author, have your name on the spine of one of the books in Grandpa\u2019s Study (this also includes a signed A3 poster of Grandpa\u2019s Study showing your name on the book spine), plus unique 'Rune styled 8 gig USB Memory Pen' (see illustration). OTHER PREVIOUS REWARDS INCLUDED ARE: DREAM SONG PLUS, LIMITED EDITION POSTCARD and BOOK OF DREAMERS. Also a digital Dream Song Backers Badge for this support tier.

Pledge $200 approx / \u20ac145 approx\r\n===========================\r\n11. YOUR SONG ON THE RADIO ~ Your self-penned song (mp3 recording, a complete track not longer than 4 minutes) featured on the Walt Wowser Show on \u2018Grandpa\u2019s Radio\u2019 \u2013 to hear just enter the Library in the game, tune in the radio and enjoy the show. The artist's name and title of the song will be mentioned on Walt\u2019s show as well as being listed in \u2018The Book of Songs\u2019 (it will also be listed on our website under Radio & Songbook Music Credits and will include a link to your website or social media page), plus unique 'Rune styled 8 gig USB Memory Pen' (see illustration). OTHER PREVIOUS REWARDS INCLUDED ARE: DREAM SONG PLUS, and LIMITED EDITION POSTCARD. Also a digital Dream Song Backers Badge for this support tier.

Pledge $252 approx / \u20ac182  approx\r\n===========================\r\n12. BOOK DEDICATION ~ A Personal Dedication (not more than 4 lines), written by you for someone you care about or perhaps a personal verse to be seen \u2018in game\u2019 in Grandpa\u2019s \u2018Book of Thoughts\u2019. This also includes two signed A6 Dream Song postcards printed with your personally written dedication, plus unique 'Rune styled 8 gig USB Memory Pen' (see illustration).  OTHER PREVIOUS REWARDS INCLUDED ARE: DREAM SONG PLUS, and LIMITED EDITION POSTCARD. Also a digital Dream Song Backers Badge for this support tier.

Pledge $300 approx / \u20ac218 approx\r\n===========================\r\n13. YOUR FACE ~ A likeness of Your Face depicted in Grandpa\u2019s book of \u2018Mad Inventors\u2019 (see illustration), includes a specially printed A3 poster depicting your likeness in the book, plus unique 'Rune styled 8 gig USB Memory Pen' (see illustration). OTHER PREVIOUS REWARDS INCLUDED ARE: DREAM SONG PLUS, LIMITED EDITION POSTCARD and BOOK OF DREAMERS. Also a digital Dream Song Backers Badge for this support tier.

Pledge $335 approx / \u20ac242 approx =========================== 14. DREAM SONG SILVER ~ A Kickstarter exclusive: Limited Edition (50 only). A 3D printed, silver finished Dream Song Chalice miniature, includes DREAM SONG PLUS ~ A digital copy of Dream Song Parts 1 & 2 for your preferred platform (PC or Mac) as soon as each part is released. Your name in the credits, a PDF Booklet of concept art, a mp3 of original \u2018Dream Song\u2019 recording with copy of lyrics, plus an exclusively recorded mp3 sound track \u2018The Flight of the Song Thrush\u2019 (this sound track will only be available to KS Backers), including a specially designed Song Thrush Wallpaper to adorn your desktop, plus unique 'Rune styled 8 gig USB Memory Pen' (see illustration). Also a digital Dream Song Backers Badge for this support tier.

Pledge $420 approx / \u20ac300 approx =========================== 15. DREAM SONG GOLD ~ A Kickstarter exclusive: Limited Edition (25 only. 20 for this tier and 5 for Full Monty tier). A 3D printed, gold finished Dream Song Chalice miniature, includes DREAM SONG PLUS ~ A digital copy of Dream Song Parts 1 & 2 for your preferred platform (PC or Mac) as soon as each part is released. Your name in the credits, a PDF Booklet of concept art, a mp3 of original \u2018Dream Song\u2019 recording with copy of lyrics, plus an exclusively recorded mp3 sound track \u2018The Flight of the Song Thrush\u2019 (this sound track will only be available to KS Backers), including a specially designed Song Thrush Wallpaper to adorn your desktop, plus unique 'Rune styled 8 gig USB Memory Pen' (see illustration). Also a digital Dream Song Backers Badge for this support tier.

Pledge $470 approx / \u20ac340 approx\r\n===========================\r\n16. FACE & DEDICATION DELUXE ~ Your chance to have both a likeness of your face (or someone special to you) and a personal dedication of 4 lines, thoughtfully written by you in Grandpa\u2019s 'Guest Book\u2019 (which includes two specially printed A6 postcards and A3 poster depicting your dedication in book), plus unique 'Rune styled 8 gig USB Memory Pen' (see illustration). OTHER PREVIOUS REWARDS INCLUDED ARE: DREAM SONG PLUS, and LIMITED EDITION POSTCARD. Also a digital Dream Song Backers Badge for this support tier.

Pledge $585 approx / \u20ac425 approx\r\n===========================\r\n17. CRACKPOT INVENTIONS ~ Your opportunity to sketch out a crackpot invention that we will include in Dream Song (we will send you the format to copy) as one of 'The Blueprint' contraptions that have to be constructed as a 'Drag & Drop' puzzle. Your finished contraption will be animated and include sound. We will also send you 'The Blueprint' of our finished copy of your design. We will also include a likeness of Your Face in Grandpa\u2019s book of \u2018Mad Inventors\u2019 on a page dedicated to you along with your original sketch (we will also send you a specially printed A3 poster depicting your page in the book), plus unique 'Rune styled 8 gig USB Memory Pen' (see illustration). OTHER PREVIOUS REWARDS INCLUDED ARE: DREAM SONG PLUS, and LIMITED EDITION POSTCARD. Also a digital Dream Song Backers Badge for this support tier.

Pledge $670 approx / \u20ac485 approx \r\n===========================\r\n18. GRANDADDY COMBO ~ Feast your eyes on this! Hear yourself speak on \u2018Grandpa\u2019s Radio\u2019 and be ONE OF THE STARS OF THE SHOW \u2013 we shall record you over the phone and incorporate your voice into legendary Dick Witty\u2019s phone-in show \u2013 to hear just enter Grandpa's Study in the game and tune in the radio to the correct frequency. Also includes unique 'Rune styled 8 gig USB Memory Pen' (see illustration). OTHER PREVIOUS REWARDS INCLUDED ARE: DREAM SONG PLUS, LIMITED EDITION POSTCARD, BOOK OF DREAMERS and YOUR FACE. Also a digital Dream Song Backers Badge for this support tier.

Pledge $1,175 approx / \u20ac850 approx\r\n===========================\r\n19. SONGWRITER ~ This is a supreme prize package for its reward is a specially written song by Dream Song creator and BBC nominated songwriter Berny Poulton, using words that you personally submit (the words of course will have to be agreed by Felstaf). The finished track will be recorded on CD with a specially designed cover and case (2 copies will be produced). Further, a 30 second sample of it will also feature on the Walt Wowser Show on \u2018Grandpa\u2019s Radio\u2019 \u2013 to hear just enter Grandpa's Study in the game, tune in the radio and enjoy the show. The lyricist's name and the title of song will be mentioned on Walt\u2019s show as well as being listed along with the complete lyrics in \u2018The Book of Songs\u2019. It will also be listed on our website under Radio & Songbook Music. Also includes unique 'Rune styled 8 gig USB Memory Pen' (see illustration). OTHER PREVIOUS REWARDS INCLUDED ARE: DREAM SONG PLUS and LIMITED EDITION POSTCARD. Also a digital Dream Song Backers Badge for this support tier.

Pledge $3,350 approx / €2,425 approx =========================== 20. THE FULL MONTY ~ This offers you the ultimate reward starting with 
1) A Limited Edition copy of 'Dream Song': a Hardback book of the story with 12 full colour plates from the game, plus many other images. This rare book also includes a unique 'Rune Puzzle' (only 1 of 5 backers can claim the special reward it offers - will it be you?). 
2) Your name will be written in to the story (both in the game text and in the book). 
3) A full size hand crafted magnifying glass as featured in the game (complete with embedded rune and amber crystal). 
4) DREAM SONG GOLD ~ A Kickstarter exclusive: Limited Edition (25 only, 5 for this tier). A 3D printed, gold finished Dream Song Chalice miniature, includes DREAM SONG PLUS ~ A digital copy of Dream Song Parts 1 & 2 for your preferred platform (PC or Mac) as soon as each part is released. A PDF Booklet of concept art, a mp3 of original ‘Dream Song’ recording with copy of lyrics, plus an exclusively recorded mp3 sound track ‘The Flight of the Song Thrush’ (this sound track will only be available to KS Backers), including a specially designed Song Thrush Wallpaper to adorn your desktop. 
5) A deluxe version of the LIMITED EDITION POSTCARD ~ A unique set of 12 postcards (as used in game) based on Clara E Atwood’s Book of Nursery Rhyme illustrations of 1850–1914 (this rare set will feature your name exquisitely decorated on the special presentation box). Please note that delivery of postcards will be October 2014. 
6) Your name will be etched on the plaque of 'The Five Furies' and fixed to a tree in the dark forest as featured in the game's flight scene. 
7) Your name will also be mentioned in the account of 'The Five Furies' that is written in a book and kept in Grandpa's Study where you can take it down to read 'in game' at your leisure. 
8) A unique 'Rune styled 8 gig USB Memory Pen' loaded with 1 gig of mystery features from Dream Song (see illustration). 
9) As an ultimate backer, you will get a special mention in the credits. Also a digital Dream Song Backers Badge for this support tier.
